body:
Hi it's ebirdy9, and today I want to make this post for nostalgia.  If you were in the TS crew you know who you are (tino, refuse, d00zie, sunny, broker, plaza etc...)

PLEASE POST MEMORIES! 

I have a ton but im on my phone so here's some
https://avicus.net/forums/discussions/7f8068b3b
RazzleDazzled
#RASE

Many more

title: old TS crew memories

replies.body: I don't think Evocal will ever know how much he meant to me. He was as good as a memory could get.
replies.body_tagged: I don't think Evocal will ever know how much he meant to me. He was as good as a memory could get.

replies.body: I never bothered going on TS at the time of the old TS Crew, but I had a few memories from stories. Did they do that whole PUB OR RIOT thing or was that one of the newer groups? I think I remember Mooch being a part of that.
